alert.note: Alert for Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 03 at 7:27AM EST until January 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Cumberland River at Williamsburg affecting Whitley County. For the Cumberland River...including Cumberland, Baxter, Pineville, Barbourville, Williamsburg...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Cumberland River at Williamsburg. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM EST Monday the stage was 17.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.3 feet this evening. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued 5 PM EST.
